Package model

Class Capsule

java.lang.Object
model.Capsule
public class Capsule extends Object
Represents a knowledge capsule.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Capsule(String situationDescription, int capsuleType, String authorName, String authorPosition, String lessonLearned)
    Creates a new Capsule object with the specified situation description, capsule type, author name, author position, and lesson learned.

  • Constructor Details

    • Capsule

      public Capsule(String situationDescription, int capsuleType, String authorName, String authorPosition, String lessonLearned)
      Creates a new Capsule object with the specified situation description, capsule type, author name, author position, and lesson learned.
      Parameters:
      situationDescription - A description of the situation or experience that the capsule is based on.
      capsuleType - The type of capsule (e.g. personal experience, customer feedback, etc.).
      authorName - The name of the author of the capsule.
      authorPosition - The position of the author of the capsule.
      lessonLearned - The lesson learned from the situation or experience.

    • extractLessonHashtags

      public void extractLessonHashtags(String lesson)
      Extracts hashtags from the lesson learned and adds them to the hashtags array.
      Parameters:
      lesson - the lesson learned from the capsule

    • extractSituationHashtags

      public void extractSituationHashtags(String situation)
      Extracts hashtags from the situation description and adds them to the hashtags array.
      Parameters:
      situation - the situation that led to the knowledge being shared
